alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 5:52PM MDT until May 25 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MUSSELSHELL AND EAST CENTRAL GOLDEN VALLEY COUNTIES... At 551 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Roundup, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Musselshell and east central Golden Valley Counties. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
